predicate.note: Frames file for 'redeem' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet class 10.5.

roleset.name: save and exchange

example.name: boring transitive
example.text: The restaurant operator said it has redeemed its rights issued Monday under its shareholder rights plan.
example.arg: its rights issued Monday under its shareholder rights plan

example.name: clearly in exchange
example.text: The company said it can redeem the warrants at its option for $1 each.

example.name: less obviously in exchange
example.text: Hudson's Bay said it will redeem 9.5 million Series H preferred shares on Oct. 31 at a price of C$ 27.75 each.

roleset.note: There's a joke here about Jesus redeeming sinners, but let's not go there. :)
